version_description:
1) New vehicle: Force SE 14 BLACK.
2) New fully reworked physics.
From now on, it's much easier to manage drift angle for any car in the game.
3) New multiplayer core loop.
The game now has seasons limited by time. Players are awarded with gems, coins and chests at the beginning of a new season depends on their current league.
4) Car upgrade system was changed.
With each new level car receives extra bonus to maximum drift angle, speed and handling.
